artist: Author: Okra P. Dingle , et al.; Publisher: ABC No Rio, New York
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, xerographic photo-collage of text, urban plans of city blacks, and a photograph of Anne Messner posing with bolt cutters inside a guitar case, printed on wove paper covers; 22 pp.
title: ABC No Rio: Founders Era Artifacts
